divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving my work truck east on Bellvue toward Hwy 59. To my left 500- 1000ft high 1 mile or 2 north I saw what looked like a stainless hotel serving dish I reached for the CB radio to see if the other Drivers were seeing the same thing . when I looked back it was gone in less than 3 seconds Didn't see it leave, looked far and wide it was not there and im not prone to dilusions Kevin Burris
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Merced
There were no other sightings in Merced on or around August 31st 2007
Summary: Looked like stainless serving dish 1000ft up 2 miles north of position
